title: Luxury 4BR Villa in Karen
description: Set on half an acre of manicured grounds, this elegant four‑bedroom villa offers luxury living in the exclusive Karen neighbourhood. The property features a flowing open‑plan layout with high ceilings, a gourmet kitchen and expansive patios overlooking a landscaped garden.

title: Modern 3BR Apartment in Lavington
description: This bright and airy three‑bedroom apartment offers contemporary living in the heart of Lavington. An open‑plan kitchen flows into the lounge and dining area which opens onto a spacious balcony with city views. Residents enjoy a communal pool, gym and secure parking.

title: Spacious 4BR House in Kilimani
description: Situated in the sought‑after Kilimani neighbourhood, this four‑bedroom home boasts a generous garden, spacious kitchen and bright living spaces. The master bedroom is en‑suite with a walk‑in closet, while two additional bedrooms share a Jack‑and‑Jill bathroom.

title: 5‑Acre Farm Land in Kiambu
description: A rare opportunity to acquire fertile agricultural land just 25 minutes from Nairobi CBD. The gently sloping parcel is ideal for mixed farming or subdivision and sits close to a main road with access to utilities.

title: Luxury 2BR Penthouse in Westlands
description: Perched on the top floor, this two‑bedroom penthouse enjoys panoramic city views from its wrap‑around terrace. Finished to a high standard with German appliances, marble countertops and hardwood flooring throughout. Residents enjoy a rooftop gym and entertainment area.

title: Multi‑Storey Commercial Block in Ngong
description: This newly constructed commercial building spans four floors and offers flexible office and retail space along the busy Ngong Road corridor. The property includes ample parking, a backup generator and a lift serving all floors.

title: Bedsitter Complex in Eastleigh
description: An income‑generating complex of twenty self‑contained bedsitters, each with its own kitchenette and bathroom. Located near Eastleigh Mall, this property offers steady rental returns and strong demand from tenants.

title: Beachfront 5BR Villa in Mombasa
description: Wake up to the sound of waves in this stunning five‑bedroom villa set on the white sands of Nyali beach. Designed for indoor‑outdoor living, the home features a pool, gazebo and lush tropical gardens. Ideal as a family retreat or holiday rental.

title: Furnished 3BR Apartment in Kilimani
description: Move right into this tastefully furnished three‑bedroom unit located within walking distance of Yaya Centre. Enjoy a bright living area, modern kitchen, balcony and access to a pool and gym. Rent includes service charge.

title: Charming 2BR House in Westlands
description: This cosy two‑bedroom home sits on a quiet cul‑de‑sac in Westlands. Featuring a mature garden, spacious kitchen and carport, it’s perfect for a small family or young professionals.

title: Affordable Bedsitter in South B
description: Compact yet comfortable, this self‑contained studio comes with its own kitchenette and bathroom. Located near shopping and public transport, it’s ideal for students or young professionals.

title: Office Space in Upper Hill
description: Set your business up for success in this modern office suite located in Nairobi’s financial district. The space features a reception area, open‑plan workstation and boardroom with large windows providing natural light.

title: Cozy 1BR Apartment in Parklands
description: A sunny one‑bedroom unit with an open kitchen, balcony and built‑in wardrobes. Ideal for single professionals looking for a central yet quiet address.

title: Family 3BR House in Ongata Rongai
description: This three‑bedroom bungalow in Rongai comes with a spacious compound, modern kitchen and ample parking. It’s just minutes from shopping centres, schools and major roads.

title: Seafront 2BR Apartment in Nyali
description: Enjoy resort‑style living in this furnished two‑bedroom apartment overlooking the Indian Ocean. Residents have access to a pool, gym and secure parking.

title: 3BR Bungalow in Kisumu
description: This charming lake‑view bungalow offers peaceful living just minutes from Kisumu CBD. The home features a lush garden, spacious bedrooms and a detached staff quarter.

title: Safari‑Themed 1BR Airbnb, Nairobi
description: Experience the spirit of Kenya in this safari‑themed apartment located just minutes from the national park. The cosy unit offers a fully equipped kitchen, queen‑sized bed and unique decor celebrating local wildlife.

title: Rustic 2BR Cottage in Karen
description: Tucked away in the leafy suburb of Karen, this cosy cottage offers a peaceful retreat with rustic charm. Ideal for weekend getaways or longer stays, the cottage features a fireplace, large verandah and manicured gardens.

title: Ranch‑Style 3BR Villa in Nanyuki
description: Nestled on the slopes of Mount Kenya, this ranch‑style villa offers sweeping views, cosy interiors and easy access to wildlife conservancies. Perfect for family retreats and adventure seekers alike.

title: Beach Cabana – 1BR in Diani
description: Escape to paradise in this charming cabana just steps from the warm waters of the Indian Ocean. Enjoy lazy afternoons in a hammock or explore nearby beach bars and restaurants.

title: Luxury 2BR Apartment, Diani
description: Indulge yourself in this luxury apartment overlooking the turquoise waters of Diani. The property offers an infinity pool, gym and direct access to the white sand beach.

title: 4BR Lakehouse Retreat, Naivasha
description: Relax in a private lakehouse with panoramic views of Lake Naivasha. This spacious retreat comes with its own dock, bonfire pit and optional chef services for a truly indulgent stay.

title: Modern Studio in Thika
description: Conveniently located near Thika Road, this stylish studio is perfect for travellers or business guests seeking a comfortable stay with easy access to Nairobi.

title: Serviced Offices – Westlands
description: Book fully serviced office space by the day in the heart of Westlands. Amenities include a staffed reception, meeting rooms, fast internet and complimentary coffee.
